website_summaries.verdict: Solid, durable steel pegs (2) for 3/8-inch 26-thread axles, available in black or chrome.
pros: Black or chrome finish available, heavy-duty steel pegs fit any axle with the thread pattern 3/8-inch and 26 threads per inch
Easy to install, although a large wrench is helpful
Outside is knurled and grooved to maintain good grip
Sturdy, and reasonable price for good quality pegs
cons: A few purchasers complained they bent their axle while using these pegs for freestyle

customer_reviews.title: Not 14mm pegs .
customer_reviews.text: Well if you want a front peg this is the one but don't think they will fit on your rear unless you have a older bmx bike ...they are not 14mm pegs for newer bikes .
customer_reviews.author: scott a.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! (Big ripper)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I haven't had the time to wheelie with them on but they fit on my SE big ripper.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit mongoose
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after doing research and was advised would fit my daughters mongoose legion. They don’t the threading is too small. This seems to be common issue with these pegs. They appeared solidly built though.
customer_reviews.author: Catara Carrell

customer_reviews.title: These were really easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These were really easy to install. We had tried another brand prior and couldn't get them to fit no matter what we did - but these went right on with no hassle. Definitely heed the advice from other reviewers about the size difference between the silver and black.
customer_reviews.author: Kayjayr6

customer_reviews.title: Only received one
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. However, I am returning or hoping to get in touch with the seller. We only received one peg. Was disappointed since it was Christmas morning and my boy had been anxiously waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Zulema Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Has some grip with out tearing your skin if you accidentally rub your leg on it.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Not slippery at all, but not like it will tear up your skin if you accidentally rub your leg on it. I am using it on my 6 year old sons, 14 inch bike. This is more for him to have fun and not to go pro any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sonic146

customer_reviews.title: I ordered for my sons bike he is 6 and they added what felt like 10 pounds to the bike
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy!!! If they hit you in the shin it will hurt! I ordered for my sons bike he is 6 and they added what felt like 10 pounds to the bike!
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of pegs
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of pegs, good material not too heavy and looks really dope, the only problem is that they didn't fit my bike because I didn't do my research. All in all great piece but make sure you know there going to fit before you purchase them. They are 33mm in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor package but good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but packaging looked tampered with. The zip ties were cut.
customer_reviews.author: Lola V.

customer_reviews.title: They are nice, just they rust very easily and you need ...
customer_reviews.text: They are nice, just they rust very easily and you need a wrench to get them on tight enough. Not bad though, got em for my big ripper.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Broomstick

customer_reviews.title: Fit 90s Dyno BMX bike
customer_reviews.text: It fit an old 90s Dyno BMX bike perfectly. Even holds middle aged men just fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Product came in used and cut out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT I put on A bmx bike just what I was looking for thank you
customer_reviews.author: richard oakes

customer_reviews.title: Received a return
customer_reviews.text: Pegs seem good but I received them loose with destroyed retail packaging. One was also scratched. I installed them anyway, but was kind of annoyed that I received a damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fast set up and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Had them on the bike in 5 min. Good and strong. We have been using them for over a month now and no problems. Father and daughter both recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery great price 20in BMX front wheel works great
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and my son love his bike now even more
customer_reviews.author: Maryum Najeeb

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fits my Mountain bike perfectly. I just wished I bought this instead of the other brands from the big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy & steady pegs, fit perfectly on my sons 16in Trek bike.
customer_reviews.author: Missgracie

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: you can tighten them with your hand so that's great
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Isidoro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's bike and it's not a BMX. Fit on perfectly. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put it on
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put it on. My son loved it. I will purchase another one for the front of his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima P. Galiza

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, with a hatch pattern on the surface make these pegs very functional. The wrench pattern end makes tightening a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: daner

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Got these items quickly. Installed them within seconds. Have had them for a month now and they are good quality! Daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: JM648

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Fit easily on the back of my Schwinn mountain bike. Excellent quality and very sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: ERSA123

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to install on my Jeep as foot pegs. Very solid product
customer_reviews.author: Angel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Take the nut off the bmx back tire
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit smaller than I liked but theyes are still good to use for a actual bolt on a bmx bike
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this product locally and my bike shops quoted the pair at $28. This is the best value I've seen on the net. They are very sturdy. The product was received sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: FMPP

customer_reviews.title: Pegs are good but not for a mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: These black ops pegs are good but if you have a mountain bike like me so seriously dont buy these because these are only for the bmx bike cuz there excels are long but the mountain bike's excel are not long so these will never will to your mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mateen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to or bike
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We have an autistic son who rides with us on the back seat of our bikes. These are perfect for him to rest his legs on. Very sturdy and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Olena B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tightened them too tight and stripped them, my own fault I guess
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect as custom foot pegs for my Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I expected, but very solid construction. Worked perfect as custom foot pegs for my Jeep Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pegs
customer_reviews.text: Pegs were exactly what my son wanted. went on bike easily, shipped right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Tashika

customer_reviews.title: These did not fit my son's BMX bike. They ...
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit my son's BMX bike. They were too small. They are heavy duty but the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Pitbo55mom

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that it's made with lead
customer_reviews.text: I guess Lead meant, made with lead. I don't like that it's made with lead. extremely heavy and when it chips its chipping lead everywhere? i'd rather inhale micro shards of aluminium or steel than LEAD. yuck
customer_reviews.author: Chad E Laswell

customer_reviews.title: Did not come as a pair as stated!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading all the questions that stated they came as a pair, the description says "pegS" and my delivery notification even says "pegS were delivered" and it only came with one. The package itself even says pegS and it is clear that one was ripped out of the package already. Very unhappy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kbcsmom

customer_reviews.title: These were great and I still have them I just never wrote ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great and I still have them I just never wrote a review for them But seriously nothing goes wrong with them and fit my bike perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great pegs, but they are heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great pegs, but they are heavy. Use these for flatland, as any 3/8th inch axle will inevitably get bent by pegs regardless of how good they are. Also, you'll need a big wrench to install them.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Construction and overall quality is quite good on these pegs
customer_reviews.text: Construction and overall quality is quite good on these pegs. They are a bit slippery when performing tricks. The knurling on the pegs is not deep enough to hold your shoe in place so it feels slick. You really have to pay attention. Note: These will fit on old school Dyno Freestyle forks from 1986 to 1988 with the small "reverse dropouts."
customer_reviews.author: RRL

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my gt freestyle, the pegs are 26tpi
customer_reviews.author: J.CO.MA

customer_reviews.title: ... used it as motorcycle passanger pegs and they work great. I also screwed them onto my brothers bmx ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it as motorcycle passanger pegs and they work great. I also screwed them onto my brothers bmx bike and they were i direct screw on with the 3/8 mm screw.
customer_reviews.author: jordanhettinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pegs work great!!! Strong and really fun to ride on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Curri Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard sized axles...
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son's standard-sized bike axles perfectly; all he had to do is screw them on! They are also strong enough to support his 130 pounds, and have good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Valora Raziel

product_meta.title: Black Ops Lead Foot BMX Pegs
product_meta.description: Black Ops Lead Foot BMX Pegs in two different colors
